page.title: 05CURRIE GARAGE
page.content: We interviewed Mr.L from Hope Scott Garage in Currie, which specialises in Austin Rover cars, although they also have a Dynamo Spyder Ferrari car which is not for sale. The showroom is small, but it is possible to fit five cars into it. Mr.L is the managing director and he lives in a small flat above the garage. In a normal day he would handle the financial side of the garage and the workshop accounts. He works nine hours a day and five and a half days a week. His garage sells Shell petrol. The garage has a workshop where they repair all the cars. The busiest day is Monday during the times 8-9a.m. and 4-5p.m. The garage gets approximately 150 customers a day. The garage also used to sponsor cars in the Monte Carlo race.
